comments.comment: The devolution from being a socially awkward spy into a mass murderer who talks to a banana is the funniest thing I've seen all week
Blending in like a true hitman, completely inconspicuous with the heavy breathing and punching that woman. Then fooling the guards with his masterful skill of deception. Amazing.

The commentary and storyline by Pewds was wayyyy too good
"I'm the guard!!!"
"She fell! Let me give her water, she must be dehydrated"
This is legitimately one of the funniest videos I've seen in the last few months. Thanks, Pewds.
Whenever Pewds plays Vr games he always starts to devolve into insanity
You really need to play this again this was so entertaining.
This feels really nostalgic. Pewds talking to inanimate objects and screwing around while genuinely having fun feels a lot like when he played Amnesia or Happy Wheels.
That was priceless. Felix's ability to form relationships with inanimate objects is the very foundation of this channel. Lol
Literally the funniest thing I've watched this week. Hitman VR must have been so weird to play but funny at the same time
When Pewds puts on the headset, he literally turns into an entirely different person and I love it.

I was cracking up when he was smacking her in the shoulder. "You know how it is, right?" PUNCH. 
Lost it with the gesturing to her on the floor. "WHAT?! SHE FELL!" Then running up to intercept guards before the get there, "Okay, I know how this looks..." It's exactly how I think most real people would behaving in that situation.
Love how absolutely chaotic Felix becomes when he plays silly games
i love how its literally ingrained in felix to form an emotional connection with a random inanimate object whenever he plays games
this was such a rollercoaster
Finally CLASSIC PEWDS! FINALLY Felix BECOMES PEWDIEPIE AGAIN! Im laughing Non Stop!
Pewdiepie doing VR is the best content ever... His HalfLife Alyx literally made me excited to come home every day and watch it.
I love it when Felix plays games and makes friends with random objects
I love how Felix turns into an absolute psychopath every time he plays in VR

Gray: "what to do with all that power."

Felix: "banana"
9:00 I love how Pewds is trying to kill someone but since it’s his first time as hit man the guard is being very patient
I like to image this is how Pewds really interacts with people at parties.

I'm not ashamed to admit as a 41 yr old Nana that I'm laughing at this from the moment you began, I'm watching this a 2nd time as it was just perfect. It's the nods and gesturing that got me, then decking the lady over a bottle of water, the smashing the chopping board, the bathroom and the vlogging OMG I've not laughed this much in ages. I bloody needed that Pewds. Thank u!!
This made my whole week! Haven’t laughed like this in a long time! Ty pewds! Never change
Pewds playing vr games like this is my favorite thing. His dialogue and the way he interacts is hysterical!

Felix: punches every person that crosses his path

Also Felix: "I'm not very good at stealth games..."

"You don't find this awkward?"
Pewds: Immediately goes for the handshake

Not the Oblivion music kicking up at 3:37 and utterly killing me as I'm recovering from the guy walking by saying "hello" and then the speech increased" message giving me a double tap and causing my parents to ask if I was alright
Hey felix, Im genuinely asking you for more hitman vr content. It's been a while since I laughed that hard, thank you very much
The oblivion music was on point!
I could watch him play VR all day. He is so entertaining.
I imagine PewDiePie acting this way in public
This version of Pewdiepie genuinely scares me XD

"What's the cause of death?"
"Potassium poisoning."
"Dang it! From what, a pill, needle, or...."
"You already know the answer."
"NO... I mean no it can't be-"
"He's back, they are back."
"My old rival."
"The banana assassin."
"Possasin, Potassium assassin."

This was genuinely one of the funniest videos I've watched in a while
I love this game

Pweds: trying to assassinate the security guard
Sec. guard: "Careful"

*Man falls 50 stories into another part of the building
Pewds: "I think he might live actually."
I haven't snort laughed in quite a while until 15:31 when felix just casually pushes off the dead body off the building while softly saying, "banana"

Pewds: i need to blend in

Also Pewds: has in-depth conversations with a banana
The fact that this is almost as enjoyable as the real thing shows how well they make their games
“You don’t find this awkward?” Is one of the funniest things he could’ve said in an Indian accent STEFANO!? Goddamn it’s been a lifetime since I’ve heard that name.
